Package com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RowModel
    The RowModel interface specifies the methods the TabularPropertyInspector will use to interrogate a tabular data model.
    RowModelListener
    RowModelListener defines the interface for an object that listens to changes in a RowModel.
    SortedTableModel
    Sort support for table model
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRowModel
    This abstract class takes care of management of the listeners and provides some convenience methods for generating RowModelEvent and dispatching them to the listeners.
    BeanTableModelAdapter
    Adapter for adapt RowModel interface into TableModel interface.
    BevelArrowIcon  
    BlankIcon  
    Column
    This class is used for creating of properties for controlling of the table header Each instance of this class represents one column of the table.
    ColumnBeanInfo  
    ColumnMessageBundle  
    ColumnModel
    Represents column description for all the columns in the table
    ColumnModelBeanInfo
    Bean info for ColumnModel.
    ColumnModelMessageBundle  
    ColumnWithSort
    This class is used for creating of columns that represent sortable series of data
    ColumnWithSortBeanInfo  
    ColumnWithSortMessageBundle  
    DefaultRowModel
    This is an implementation of RowModel that uses a Vector to store the beans.
    RowComparator
    Compare table rows.
    RowHeaderBean  
    RowHeaderBeanBeanInfo  
    RowHeaderRenderer  
    RowModelEvent
    RowModelEvent is used to notify listeners that row model (i.e. list of displayed beans) has changed.
    SortButtonRenderer
    Render column header as button with field name and arrow indicates sort order.
    SortedBeanTableModelAdapter  
    SortedColumnModel  
    SortEditor  
    TableSorter
    Sort table model by column or by field options.
